title: Contributing
text: Ensure install build dependencies removed end layer build. Update README.md details changes interface. includes new environment variables, exposed ports, useful file locations, container parameters. Increase version numbers examples files README.md new version Pull Request represent. may merge Pull Request sign-package owner.

title: Contributing
text: interest fostering open welcoming environment, contributors maintainers pledge making participation project community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity expression, level experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation.

title: Contributing
text: Examples behavior contributes creating positive environment include: Using welcoming inclusive language respectful differing viewpoints experiences Gracefully accepting constructive criticism Focusing best community Showing empathy towards community members Examples unacceptable behavior participants include: use sexualized language imagery unwelcome sexual attention advances Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical electronic address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributing
text: Project maintainers responsible clarifying standards acceptable behavior expected take appropriate fair corrective action response instances unacceptable behavior. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, ban temporarily permanently contributor behaviors deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful.

title: Contributing
text: Code Conduct applies within project spaces public spaces individual representing project community. Examples representing project community include using official project e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event. Representation project may defined clarified project maintainers.

title: Contributing
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported contacting project team .frierson@gmail.com. complaints reviewed, investigated, result response deemed necessary & appropriate circumstances. project team obligated maintain confidentiality regard reporter incident. details specific enforcement policies may posted separately. Project maintainers follow enforce Code Conduct good faith may face temporary permanent repercussions determined members project’s leadership.

title: Using the `wmm` package
text: v1.1.2, exported function GetMagneticFieldWMM, returns orthogonal vector components main magnetic field (nT) secular variation field (nT/yr) predicted WMM. magnetic field elements, h, f, , d (well secular variation) returned well. Example usage: Calculate expected magnetic field components benchmark location, mid 2022. Using default value WMM version, use WMM2020 coefficients. Repeat last calculation apply 2017.5 use older coefficients WMM2015 replaced WMM2015v2. Note: WMM intended predictive. using older set coefficients, returned values reflect older predictions. users need good model Earth’s magnetic field prior current WMM, please see latest IGRF model, retroactively updated. wmmVersion feature intended reproducibility purposes .

title: World Magnetic Model
text: World Magnetic Model (WMM) purpose package make accessible magnetic field vector components WMM. supported date ranges wmm run 2000-01-01 2024-12-31. magnetic field calculations across time range agree official WMM test values precision provided authors (see unit tests package details). update package new WMM version. prefer non-R solution, authors WMM provide free software calculate magnetic field official website.

what: Calculate Expected Magnetic Field from WMM — GetMagneticFieldWMM
title: Calculate Expected Magnetic Field from WMM — GetMagneticFieldWMM
text: Function takes geodetic GPS location annualized time, returns expected magnetic field WMM.

title: Calculate Expected Magnetic Field from WMM — GetMagneticFieldWMM
code: GetMagneticFieldWMM(lon, lat, height, time, wmmVersion = "derived")  wmm(lon, lat, height, time, wmmVersion = "derived")

title: Calculate Expected Magnetic Field from WMM — GetMagneticFieldWMM
text: lon GPS longitude lat GPS latitude, geodetic height GPS height meters ellipsoid time Annualized date time. E.g., 2015-02-01 = (2015 + 32/365) = 2015.088; optionally object (length 1) class 'POSIXt' 'Date' wmmVersion String representing WMM version use. Must consistent time one following: 'derived', 'WMM2000', 'WMM2005', 'WMM2010', 'WMM2015', 'WMM2015v2', 'WMM2020'. Default 'derived' value infer latest WMM version consistent time.

title: Calculate Expected Magnetic Field from WMM — GetMagneticFieldWMM
text: list calculated main field secular variation vector components nT nT/yr, resp. magnetic element intensities (.e., horizontal total intensities, h & f) nT magnetic element angles (.e., inclination declination, & d) degrees, secular variation nT/yr deg/yr, resp.: x, y, z, xDot, yDot, zDot, h, f, , d, hDot, fDot, iDot, dDot

title: Calculate Expected Magnetic Field from WMM — GetMagneticFieldWMM
wmm 1.1.2
text: Added HTML vignette. Added @noRd flag internal functions. Added docs/CONTRIBUTING.md Added codemeta.json file.

title: wmm 1.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-09-06 Removed WMM coefficient files URLs. Adding note README re: WMM output predictions referenced IGRF.

title: wmm 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-03-17 Updated Gauss coefficients WMM2020. Significantly improved numerical stability using closed-form equation associated Legendre polynomials, instead recursion. Improved speed ~7x using multidimensional arrays. Per WMM2020, version now displays blackout zone warning horizontal intensity 6000 nT. addition orthogonal magnetic field components, GetMagneticFieldWMM returns magnetic field elements h, f, , & d well secular variation.

title: wmm 1.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-11-22 First release wmm package. Contains 1 exported function, GetMagneticFieldWMM, calculates magnetic field.
